hymn.title: O Lord, Thou art the Alpha

layout.singingstanza: O Lord, Thou art the Al -- pha And the O -- me -- ga too; Thou art the First, be -- fore all, And art the Last so true. Thou art the sole Be -- gin -- ning, The on -- ly End of all; In Thee all is in -- clud -- ed, Cre -- a -- tions great and small.

lyrics.stanza: O Lord, Thou art the Alpha And the Omega too; Thou art the First, before all, And art the Last so true. Thou art the sole Beginning, The only End of all; In Thee all is included, Creations great and small.

As First of all the creatures, Thou art the Head of all; As Last in God's creation, Thou art the close of all. As First of all the creatures, All things by Thee consist; As Last in God's creation, All things for Thee subsist.

Since Thou art the Beginning, Thou hast preceded all; And since Thou art the Ending, Thou wilt inherit all. Thou, the unique Beginning, Didst all originate; Thou, as the only Ending, Wilt all things terminate.

O Lord, how we adore Thee And treasure Thee with love; As Alpha and Omega, Thou art all things above. We praise Thee, the Beginning, The very First we call; We worship Thee, the Ending, The only Last of all.
